entries.name: tagging
entries.desc: May be used as a hint for encoding a value either implicitly or explicitly by setting it either to :IMPLICIT or to :EXPLICIT. tagging is not set when a ASN.1 structure is parsed using OpenSSL::ASN1.decode.

entries.name: OpenSSL::ASN1::Primitive.new(value [, tag, tagging, tag_class ]) => Primitiveclick to toggle source
